Package cz.kuryshee.safehome.safehomeclient

Package contains classes, which implement Android application for Safe Home project.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppConstants
    Class containing constants, which are used exclusively in the application.
    AuthorizationActivity
    Class implements Activity where user authorizes via main server.
    EventsFragment
    Class for Fragment containing layout with events information.
    GalleryFragment
    Class implements Fragment with photos from Raspberry Pi.
    GlobalVariables
    Class extends Application in order to add properties for sharing across the application.
    MainActivity
    Activity prepares the application for usage.
    PhotoItem
    Class implements bean containing data about photo from server.
    PhotoItemComparator
    Sorts PhotoItem in descending order by date.
    PhotoItemsAdapter
    Class implements custom adapter for a RecyclerView to display photos from Raspberry Pi.
    RpiControlActivity
    Activity implements view with two tabs, where user can see latest events and photos from Raspberry Pi.
    RpiEventItem
    Class representing beans of events from Raspberry Pi.
    RpiEventItemComparator
    Sorts RpiEventItem in descending order by Date.
    RpiEventItemsAdapter
    Class of customized RecyclerView.Adapter.
    SetServerActivity
    Class implements Activity for setting the main server in Debug mode.
    SynchronizeTaskService
    Class implements Service, which performs synchronizations with the server, when the application is closed.
    ViewPagerAdapter
    Implementation of class, which manages Fragments on RpiControlActivity.

Package cz.kuryshee.safehome.safehomeclient Description

Package contains classes, which implement Android application for Safe Home project.
Author:
Ekaterina Kurysheva.
